fields.observation:
The total capacity of the plant is approx. 180KLD 
 At present the load is around 20KLD and calculated load is 30KLD 
 The current technology installed is SBR 
 Current plant is not commissioned 
 Most of the electro-mechanicals are degraded due to corrosion 
 The plant has recurring flooding in the pump room 
 The ventilation system is not installed 
 The tanks are in good condition. 
 New installation of HIDREC EC1000 is possible only on surface level  
 The installation space is available adjacent to the transformer section.
fields.suggestion:
The output from HIDREC EC1000 is to be gravity fed back to the 
product water tank along the hedge available near installation site. 
 The entire set-up must be IoT enabled to be monitored and controlled 
remotely 
 The current addon installation is planned for 1 year at Mangalore and 
then it will be moved out to other location. 
 The production, installation and commissioning along with service 
agreement for a period of one year will be extended. 
 HIDREC EC1000 must be installed with 5KLD through put augmenter 
for handling design loads in peak conditions.
fields.dristi_subscription:
DRSTI software is online web-based platform that allows the users to access the running 
status of the individual machines at individual sites on any device (laptop, computer, tab 
or mobile) 
The software package integrates with IoT hub (XHUB) installed on the machines supplied 
by Xpredict. The hub consists of sensor integration, data transmission and critical control 
(ON/OFF) capabilities. The hub represents one end license that is attached to a user 
license. Any number of XHUB can be connected to DRSTI via internet.
fields.iot_hardware:
IIoT hardware consists of Xpredict proprietary wifi enabled Xcon control board. The hardware 
is capable of handling up to 8 analog sensor inputs. The micro controller is capable of 
communication via RS485, RS232 and UART protocols. The controller has 125mb flash on 
board memory and boasts a total of 85 digital/analog combined I/O. The controller works 
in tandem with the inboard plc, HMI and complete sensor package in full duplex mode and 
Performs data gathering, server upload/download and error corrections. The controller has 
a board embedded program that enables users to remotely monitor and control the 
machine. The MAC id of the controller is embedded in the user licence of Drsti software 
for secured and authentic communication and data log.

fields.observation:
The waste water is generated at the toilets, Kitchen and bathroom. 
 The wastewater from gaushala will be released in separate pipeline 
to their fields  
 There is constraint for space  
 The running cost of the STP should be as minimal as possible since 
the ROI is mostly on environmental concern. 
 The installation should be simple and should not be a burden on 
running operations and compliances of the company. 
 An STP that can handle varying water quality is needed to effectively 
address the requirement. 
 The end use of toilet treated water is to drain  
 The machineries must be compact, modular, less foot-print and 
completely automatic to reduce skill needed for operations
fields.proposal:
Xpredict Labs proposed HIDREC Bio model to be immediately implemented 
on site as a one stop solution to all the aforementioned problems of M/S 
Bharati Yogadhama,Mysore
fields.feat_advantages:
Xpredict Labs HIDREC is a range of products that are designed for unstable 
water quality and quantity requirements with a host of other added features. 
HIDREC products are designed for capacities from 0 KLD to 50 KLD as all 
up packaged automatic plant.  
The models like HIDREC Bio are made in civil tanks as well as packaged 
STP that can work on any untreated sewage or grey water
fields.salient_feat:
HIDREC is a five-step water treatment and disinfection plant that can re-claim 80% of 
the waste water back to its primary utilization. 
 The HIDREC Bio 0-25KLD plant is custom designed for the designated space. 
 The HIDREC runs only on about 1-1.5KW of single-phase power supply making it ideal 
for remote, rural and under-construction sites 
 The HIDREC is completely automatic, meaning it needs no man-power to operate and 
maintain.

fields.observation:
The site info and interaction with the operations team were carried out to 
determine the installation roadmap and planning.   
 It is planned that in near future, all waste water generated on site shall be treated 
on site as per compliance standards. 
 Mixing of sewage and effluent lines is possible for equalization and efficient 
infrastructure utilization
fields.suggestion:
The total capacity of the plant of ETP cum STP is approx. 9KLD  
 The treated water will be needed for watering of gardens and other spaces. 
 The space available is limited and all new plant shall be installed for the purpose. 
 New installation of HIDREC EZ1000 with ETP preteatment is possible 
only on surface level  
 The installation space is available adjacent to the DG section. (8ftX20ft) 
 The output from HIDREC EZ1000 is to be gravity fed back to the 
product water tank along the hedge available near installation site.

fields.info_text:
Provident Housing-Provident Skyworth site at Mangalore is an apartment 
complex with planned 7 towers and active 3 towers. The type of wastewater 
generated is sewage wastewater from toilet, bathroom and kitchen. The 
total wastewater generated is approx. 185KLD.Below are the inlet raw 
sewage characteristics given by client
fields.standard_text:
The processes defined by the CPCB for treating of sewage and waste water 
is provided in the table below. For sewage water that contains bathrooms, 
toilets, kitchen output would need following integrated processes as per 
CPCB 
 Grit separation 
 Chemical / Electrochemical settling 
 Chlorination/Ozonation/UV 
 Mixed Media filtration

fields.info_text:
Bharati Yogadhama, Mysore spread in 25acres land and buildings require 
STP water treatment plant for permanent residents 150 numbers, visitors 
20numbers and monthly camp attendants 100 numbers. There are two 
campus/sites namely
fields.standard_text:
Upper Site: The wastewater generated at the upper site is from school 
area and yogshala area only. Rest area of the site is not connected 
because of the large area piping. The quality of wastewater includes toilet 
flush, bathroom wastewater and kitchen wash. The total wastewater 
generated at the upper site shall be between 35KLd-50KLD 
Lower Site: The wastewater generated at the lower site is from school and 
hostel area and the existing pipeline connected to the existing septic tank. 
The quality of wastewater includes toilet flush, bathroom wastewater and 
kitchen wash. The total wastewater generated at the lower site shall be 
40KLD 
The processes defined by the CPCB for treating of sewage and waste water 
is provided in the table below. For sewage water that contains bathrooms, 
toilets, kitchen output would need following integrated processes as per 
CPCB 
 Grit separation 
 Moving Bed Bioreactor 
 Settling 
 EAOP/UV 
 Mixed Media filtration

fields.info_text:
M/S Fabionics factory at Bidadi has full scale sheet metal fabrication, 
Seven tank bath process and powder coating facilities all hosted under 
single roof. The factory employs more than 60 individuals and has both 
sewage and industrial effluent generation. The following points have been 
duly noted. 
 Total count of employees: Approx 65 
 Kitchen: Meal is served and only utensil wash and hand wash water 
generation  not currently stored under sewage tank 
 Washrooms: Approx 4 numbers 
 Any other source of sewage: general runoff and storm lines not 
connected to sewage line 
 Seven Tanks system: Has both caustic content and acid contents 
with pH ranging from 2 to 11. 
 Total amount of sewage water generated per day: Approx. 4000 
Litres 
 Total Average of effluent water generated: Approx 1000 Liters 
 Separate sewage and effluent tanks are available. Effluent water is 
currently lifted off by third party.
fields.standard_text:
The processes defined by the CPCB for treating of sewage and waste water 
is provided in the table below. For sewage water that contains bathrooms, 
toilets, kitchen output would need following integrated processes as per 
CPCB 
 Grit separation 
 Chemical / Electrochemical settling 
 Chlorination/Ozonation/UV 
 Mixed Media filtration

fields.req_text:
HIDREC EC1000 is a 25 KLD packaged waste water reclaimer that is modular and 
stackable. Considering the requirements, following specs and installation options are 
proposed 
 STP = 25KLD 
o HIDREC 1000  
=  
o Capacity Addon  5 KLD
fields.process_diagram_text: The HIDREC EC1000 water reclaimer contains all the stipulated processes  along with advanced integration and space saving options. The overall  process diagram of the machine is as provided below

fields.req_text:
The HIDREC Bio water reclaimer contains processes along with advanced 
integration and space saving options. The overall process diagram of the 
machine is as provided below 
 Lower Site 
 STP-40KLD

HIDREC EZ1000 is a 9 KLD packaged waste water reclaimer that is modular and 
stackable. Considering the requirements, following specs and installation options are 
proposed 
 ETP: 1KLD (Pre and primary treatment system) 
 STP = 8KLD  
o HIDREC EZ1000 =  9KLD (1 machines for STP cum ETP)
fields.process_diagram_text: The HIDREC EZ1000 water reclaimer contains all the stipulated processes  along with advanced integration and space saving options. The overall  process diagram of the machine is as provided below

fields.process_description_text:
HIDREC is a five-stage treatment process: 
1. In first stage, the wastewater is lifted from septic tank or collection tank to the bio 
chamber wherein the biological activity happens which significantly reduces the BOD 
and COD to small amount. 
2. In second and third stage, the water is pumped to the pre settler chamber and then 
to the EC CELL which is integrated with patented settler, separates foaming 
substances by hydrolysis process which further reduces the BOD, COD, TSS, color 
and smell in the wastewater.  
3. Further, the decant water is passed through up flow gravity filter. 
4. For disinfection the filtered water is passed through the UV system.  
The product water/treated water can be reused for flushing or gardening as per client 
requirement.
fields.shs_text:
t is agreed that the sludge generated will be transferred to the collection tank which 
is currently used for waste water lifting.
fields.automation_text:
HIDREC is an all in one fully automatic PLC controlled industrial IoT enabled machine 
which required no man power to operate. Occasional cleaning of grit chamber and 
reactor cell is the only manpower needed for stable operation of the machine. Hence 
no special provisioning or costs will be needed for manpower.

Supply of HIDREC EZ 1000  STP cum ETP Unit
Installation & Commissioning  of ETP cum STP HIDREC  EZ1000

fields.machine_cost_text:
Xpredict Automation Solutions pvt Ltd after assessing the scope, BOM and man hour 
requirements and skillset necessary has arrived at the least possible price as below.
fields.terms_conditions:
Payment Terms 
o 80% against supply for Item No 1-3 mentioned in the pricing section  
o 15% after installation and commissioning of the plant. 
o 5% held as retention shall be released after DLP period of one year 
 GST 18% extra 
 Product liability not covered  
 Transportation covered 
 Quote valid for 15 days 
 All exclusions mentioned in Appendix A not covered 
 The lead time for the machine will be 45 days Ex-factory from the date of PO 
and advance.

fields.machine_cost_text:
Xpredict Automation Solutions pvt Ltd after assessing the scope, BOM and man hour 
requirements and skillset necessary has arrived at the least possible price as below.
fields.terms_conditions:
GST 18% extra 
 50% advance payment along with PO. Remaining 45% prior to dispatch and 5% 
after installation and commissioning of the plant. 
 Product liability not covered 
 Transportation covered. 
 Spares only on order. 
 Quote valid for 15 days

in the proposal.

fields.performance: For commissioning and to ensure performance of the treatment plant, the purchaser has  to ensure that the flow rate and characteristics of the raw water / wastewater are as per  specified in the enquiry/ proposal.
fields.flow_characteristics: Flow and characteristics as provided by the purchaser are being considered with no change  what-so-ever. The purchaser shall have to ensure that the flow rate and characteristics are  within the stated values. This is essential for planning the commissioning and achieving the  desired output parameters.
fields.trial_quality_check:
On completion of the manufacturing of the plant, we shall officially intimate the purchaser 
with videos and photos of the complete unit and dry run test report, on which the purchaser 
shall issue us the approval certificate/E-mail approval before the dispatch.  After obtaining 
this approval we shall dispatch the unit and commission the plant at site. Staff of the 
purchaser shall be trained for plant operation during the commissioning and trial run. During 
the above period the purchaser shall arrange for power, water, chemicals, civil structures, 
internet connection and labour as required at their cost.
fields.virtual_completion:
The plant shall be deemed to have been virtually completed on hydraulic testing. In case 
of non-availability of water for hydraulic testing, the plant shall be deemed to be virtually 
completed after all supplies have been made and erected. The hydraulic testing shall be 
taken up at a later date as and when all the required inputs are made available by the 
client
Time required for completion: The time required for completion of the plant shall be two 
months from the date of receiving firm order and from the date of realization of advance 
payments. The completion period is exclusive of monsoon, trial run and commissioning. 
Force majeure clause for delay in completion shall be applicable. (due extension of time 
owing to the conditions beyond our control, shall be given).
fields.limitation_liability: In no event shall we be liable for any consequential loss or damage out of or connected  with this order, in any way what-so-ever.
fields.force_clause: Force majeure clause shall cover all acts of God, war, enemy action, embargoes, blockades,  fires, floods, civil commotion, riots, strikes, lockouts and also delay in approval of drawings,  delay in inspection, non-availability of raw materials, any restrictions imposed by statutory  authorities, strikes / lockouts at manufacturers or suppliers facility and delay in payment.
fields.additional_works: Additional works beyond the scope of works defined in the offer shall be executed by us  on mutually agreed rates.
fields.warranty_guaranty:
The equipment's general warranty is valid for all metal structures, plastics, tanks and 
plumbing for 12 months /18 months. The individual components such as sewage pumps 
get standard OEM warranty (12 months). However, there are no OEM warranties for 
electricals, electronics, display, disinfection units, software, accessories and consumables. 
The cell warranty and consumable management is covered only under AMC agreement.
fields.arbitration: Any disputes arising out of this contact shall be referred to arbitration under Indian  arbitration Act 1949 and or subsequent amendment. All disputes will be subject to courts  of Bangalore jurisdiction only.
fields.validity: The quoted price is valid up to 15 days from the date of submission of our offer.

Full Installation commissioning and testing  
 Two engineers on site for installation, commissioning and testing of HIDREC Bio 40KLD 
STP  
 Tanks internal plumbing and installation of electromechanical items

commissioning

 Bar screen
fields.clients_scope:
All civil and fabrication are required to install the equipment in client scope. Designs 
will be provided by vendor partner. 
 All inlet, outlet piping and cable laying up to source and in working condition in client 
scope.  
 Providing water and electricity as free supply from client. 
 Minimum feed required to carry out load trial in client scope. 
 Bar screen chamber support structure for the installation of bar screen to avoid bigger 
waste and floating plastic at the outlet of each source to sceptic tank. 
 Manholes 4nos, (Sizes will be given with design) 
 Piping from treated water tank to location of clients choosing 
 Air out pipeline  
 Overflows of tanks to drain line connection shall be done by client. 
 Single phase 32 Amp Electricity points  2 nos 
 All civil work like plinth, drain trenches, plant room, supporting etc 
 Sludge handling system and sludge disposal    
 Periodic clearing of compacted sludge in clients scope 
 Unloading and shifting to plant/site location. 
 Dismantling of existing structures if any. 
 Incoming power supply to the sewage treatment plant room. 
 Incoming Line up to screen chamber of effluent treatment plant. 
 Debris and solids beyond 30mm dia not handled by the HIDREC 
 Disposal of plant residuals i.e. screening, grits, dewatered sludge etc. 
 Treated sewage conveyance main to the disposal point. 
 Internal water supply network. 
 Laboratory facility including lab equipment/instruments, chemicals and staff. 
 Liaison with PCB board 
 Mixing and treatment of wastewater other than type wastewater mentioned in the 
proposal not in scope.

machine until AMC period

period

 Bio-culture for sludge reduction

 Sludge handling system and sludge disposal not covered

scope

fields.particulars: Comprehensive AMC for HIDREC EC1000 + 5KLD augmenter with IoT monitoring for 30KLD STP
Internet provisioning included Wi-fi dongle and recharge for 365 days for applicable networks

fields.terms_conditions:
Payment: Advance Monthly bill payment or advance quarterly payment
 GST: 18% Extra
 Remark: AMC period for one year
 Product liability not covered.
 Quote valid for 15 days
 Machine operation is limited upto 30KLD only.
 All AMC terms are applicable and limited to 30KLD only
 Non payment of service bill beyond 30days of billing will result in immediate stoppage of all 
 services/operations mentioned in the contract until all dues are cleared
 During suspension of services or delayed payment, damage to machine or any
other consequential/ direct loss to Provident Housing, Xpredict LABS is not responsible.
 The costs of reinstatement/repairs of HIDREC EC1000 shall be borne by client separately during resumption of services posts suspension (due to nonpayment/delayed payment).
 If suspension of services continues for 45days and beyond, the treated water
quality assurance and tests report for the running quarter and the following quarter will be cancelled
 Mixing and treatment of wastewater other than type of wastewater mentioned in
the proposal/quotation submitted during the discussion/finalization of the supply
installation and commissioning of HIDREC EC1000 machine not in scope.

fields.hidrec_wash_text:
Capacity: from 0 ltr to 15k ltr per day.
Price for the machine is 4,90,000+gst/-
fields.carwash_text:
Price for the machine is 4,90,000+gst/-
Note:
For oil containing in water separate oil skimmer has to be
taken
Price for the oil skimmer-30,000+gst/-
fields.specification:
1. Up to 4Nos of 30kg washing machine or up to 1.5 tons
cloth per day.
2. 0.9 watt per ltr Energy consumption.
3. 1kg consumables (chemical coagulant) per 7000ltr.
4. Space required 6ft(l)*4ft(w)*6.5ft(h)-24sq ft foot print.
5. Wheel mounted mobile platform.
6. 1yr warranty on all the major components.
7. Fully automatic.
8. Optional warranty package for all system at 40000/-per
annum from second year
9. Works on chemical and electrochemical process for
effective removal of detergent and dirt.
10. Up to 85% water recovery.
11. Operating cost (0.3p) per ltr.
fields.terms_conditions:
External plumbings not covered
 Drain/sludge line on client scope
 Power supply on client scope (1kw single phase)
 Transportation extra (at actuals)
 All warranty from the date of delivery
 80% Advance with PO
 Delivery 3weeks from the date of PO
 5kg chemical included with delivery
 Periodic chemical recharge ln client scope
 Raw water sump & product water sump client scope
 Supply of spares only against the order.
 Any accessories at extra (eg: flowmeter, machine cover,
extra filters, softner, etc.)
fields.general_maintenance:
1. Brush filter and product water filter cartridge
replacement every 3months.
2. Electrode replacement in every 12 months.
3. Once in a week raw pump squirrel cage cleaning.
4. All filter cartridge cleaning as required.
5. Stocking of min qty chemicals as required in cool
dry place.
6. No manual operations unless advised.
7. Long term shut down-drain all tanks.
